title: Contradictory Desecration?
keywords: Creators Syndicate Cartoonist Group freedom of speech freedom of expression first amendment amendments bill of rights constitution constitutional amendment constitutional amendments flag-burning amendment flag-burning amendments agreement agreements protests desecrate Koran human rights abuse human rights abuses torture flame flames fire fires agree with you desecration of the Koran protestor protestors Akron Beacon-Journal
caption: I may not agree with you, but I'll defend to the death your right to burn the flag in protest of desecration of the Koran.  Thanks, man ... ouch.
